graph TD
    S[User] --> A[Input Data]
    A --> B[Text]
    A --> C[Images]
    B --> D[Text Embedding - BAAI/bge-small-en-v1.5]
    C --> E[Image Embedding - clip:ViT-B/32]
    D --> F[Text Vector Store]
    E --> G[Image Vector Store]
    S --> H
    H[Query] --> I[Text Query Embedding]
    H --> J[Image Query Embedding]
    I --> K[Text Retrieval]
    J --> L[Image Retrieval]
    F --> K
    G --> L
    K --> M[Top-N Text Chunks]
    L --> N[Top-N Image Chunks]
    %% M --> P[Most Relevant Chunks]
    %% N --> P
    M --> Q[LLM - Llama2]
    N --> R   
    Q --> R[Generated Response]

    style A fill:#F2A76F,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff
    style F fill:#03DAC6,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff
    style G fill:#03DAC6,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff
    style Q fill:#03DAC6,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff
    style R fill:#BB86FC,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff

    classDef default fill:#2E3440,stroke:#88C0D0,stroke-width:2px,color:#ffffff;

%%{init: {'theme': 'dark', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#BB86FC', 'primaryTextColor': '#ffffff', 'primaryBorderColor': '#ffffff', 'lineColor': '#88C0D0', 'secondaryColor': '#03DAC6', 'tertiaryColor': '#3700B3'}}}%%
graph TD
    A[Input Data] --> B[Text]
    A --> C[Images]
    B --> D[Text Embedding]
    C --> E[Image to Text Conversion]
    E --> F[Image Metadata]
    E --> G[Text Description]
    F --> H[Text Embedding]
    G --> H
    D --> I[Unified Text Vector Space]
    H --> I
    J[User Query] --> K[Query Embedding]
    I --> L[Retrieval]
    K --> L
    L --> M[Retrieved Content]
    M --> N{Content Type?}
    N -->|Text| O[LLM]
    N -->|Image| P[MLLM]
    O --> Q[Generated Response]
    P --> Q

    style A fill:#3700B3,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff
    style I fill:#03DAC6,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff
    style N fill:#03DAC6,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff
    style Q fill:#BB86FC,stroke:#ffffff,stroke-width:3px,color:#ffffff

    classDef default fill:#2E3440,stroke:#88C0D0,stroke-width:2px,color:#ffffff;
